sentences.sContent: Might I your scribe and your confessor be.
sentences.sContent_eng: Might I your scribe and your confessor be.
sentences.sCn: 我可以你和你的忏悔神父是抄写员。

sentences.sContent: I stepped out of his office and was brought to a small window near the exit, behind which sat a scribe who I knew must be a prisoner.
sentences.sContent_eng: I stepped out of his office and was brought to a small window near the exit, behind which sat a scribe who I knew must be a prisoner.
sentences.sCn: 我走出他的办公室，被带到监狱出口处的一个小窗户边。窗后坐着一个抄写员，我知道他肯定是个囚徒。

synos.tran: 写下，记下；[建]用划线器划

words.tran: 描绘标记的用具；画线器
三流作家；小文人；潦草书写的人

trans.tranOther: someone in the past whose job was to make written copies of official documents
